outputs.output_descr:
In accordance with the UNPAF and CPD frameworks 2012-2017, this Output aims to enhance the national development processes towards climate resilience and environmental sustainability in three key aspects: mitigation, adaptation, and livelihood security. 

The activities in the Initiation Workplan 2012: Effective Response to Climate Change, are conceived as the transition from the last programme cycle to the start of the new programme cycle, providing the basis for the works under this Output in the next five year.

1) Strengthened capacity of Law Reform Commission, relevant MOJ department, CSOs for effective review of national legislation, legal empowerment process and access to justice in line with human rights standards
2) Transparency in governance process is improved through youth network and governance assessment tools

project_descr: Initiation Workplan (IWP) for Programme and Policy Support (Thailand Country Programme 2012-2016)
